sentences.en: Maestro: ( angry voice ) Is THIS scary?
sentences.cn: 迈斯卓: ( 生气的声音 ) “这个”吓人 吗 ?
迈斯卓: 这个吓着你了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Maestro: So you don't believe in ghosts?
sentences.cn: 迈斯卓: 你是说你们不相信有鬼 么 ?

sentences.en: Maestro: So, do you still want me to go?
sentences.cn: 迈斯卓: 你仍然要赶我走 吗 ?

sentences.en: Maestro: You're trying to scare me, aren't you?
sentences.cn: 迈斯卓: 你想吓唬我是吧?

sentences.en: Please consider the short list of MS SQL Maestro main features below.
sentences.cn: 请考虑短期的名单SQL女士大师的主要特点如下.

sentences.en: Referred to fondly as Maestro, Ellington loved writing music for his band.
sentences.cn: 被称为音乐大师的艾灵顿喜爱为他的乐团写歌.

sentences.en: The maestro assented to the request for an encore.
sentences.cn: 这位艺术大师应观众要求同意返场演唱.

sentences.en: The Maestro snaps and points at her. She stops talking.
sentences.cn: [迈斯卓对她打了个响指,她立刻不说话了.

sentences.en: The maestro was nursing a secret passion.
sentences.cn: 这个伟大的作曲家在照料一份神秘的感情.

sentences.en: The singer was led off the stage by the maestro.
sentences.cn: 那歌唱家被乐队指挥从舞台上引走.

sentences.en: These are the album's liner notes written by maestro Carlos Barbosa Lima.
sentences.cn: 这是专辑的班轮说明写的巴博萨大师卡洛斯利马.

sentences.en: Witness the Maestro collection of vessel, or above - counter, basins from Native Trails.
sentences.cn: 观察大师们收集的容器, 或柜台面, 本地生产的脸盆.
是的, 艺术大师同意了.

sentences.en: You wish: a happy New Year and good health, Carnival music, Maestro!
sentences.cn: 祝福您: 春节愉快、身体健康, 合家欢乐, 万事顺意!

trans.tran_cn: <意>音乐大师（尤指名指挥），艺术大师，乐队指挥，（球队等的）领队
trans.tran_en: someone who can do something very well, especially a musician
